title: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
description:
Set up comprehensive CI/CD for all packages.

**Workflows:**
1. **CI (on PR):**
   - Lint TypeScript (daemon, proxy)
   - Lint Kotlin (JetBrains plugin)
   - Run unit tests
   - Build all packages
   - Type checking

2. **Release (on tag):**
   - Build daemon and proxy
   - Publish to npm
   - Build JetBrains plugin
   - Upload to JetBrains Marketplace
   - Create GitHub Release with assets

3. **Scheduled:**
   - Dependency updates (Dependabot or Renovate)
   - Security scanning
taskRails: Use GitHub Actions reusable workflows where possible
